clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase Ia, Dose Escalation Study of Humanized Anti-VEGF Monoclonal Antibody (Sevacizumab) Injection in Patients With Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase Ia, Dose Escalation Study of Humanized Anti-VEGF Monoclonal Antibody (Sevacizumab) Injection in Patients With Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: This study is to assess the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of single dose and multiple doses of humanized anti-VEGF monoclonal antibody (Sevacizumab) in patients with advanced or metastatic solid tumors. The secondary objective is to explore the preliminary anti-tumor effects.
